NodeDescriptor(boolean) - Constructor for class polimi.reds.NodeDescriptor
Creates a NodeDescriptor with a new identifier, which is guaranteed to be unique in the network.
NodeDescriptor(String, boolean) - Constructor for class polimi.reds.NodeDescriptor
Creates a NodeDescriptor for a node of the specified type (broker or not-broker, i.e., client), with the specified URL, and with a new identifier, which is guaranteed to be unique in the network.

This class represents an exception that has to be raised when a method in charge of sending data to a neighboring broker is invoked while that broker is not connected.

Overlay - Interface in polimi.reds.broker.overlay
As its name suggests, the Overlay is the component of a REDS broker in charge of managing the overlay network of brokers on top of which CBR is performed.

RoutingStrategy - Interface in polimi.reds.broker.routing
In a REDS broker the RoutingStrategy is the module in charge of managing the routing of messages on top of the overlay network (which is realized by the Overlay and maintained, in presence of reconfiguration, by the ConnectionManager.

SubscriptionTable - Interface in polimi.reds.broker.routing
A SubscriptionTable is used by the REDS broker to store information about the subscriptions (i.e., filters) it received from its neighbors.
